Name: Doors Stay Locked
Tip: Do not unlock any locked door using a key, crowbar or lockpick.

Name: No Bodies Bagged
Tip: Do not let any bodies be put in a body bag.

Name: No Bodies Found
Tip: Do not let any bodies be found, even if they are 'unsuspicious'.

Name: No Broken Doors
Tip: Do not force entry by breaking any doors.

Name: No Explosions
Tip: Do not cause any explosions on the scene.

Name: No Weapons Confiscated
Tip: Do not let any guard put a weapon in a weapon crate (briefcases are okay).
